description:
Immich 1.111, a self-hosted photo and video backup solution, rolls out an enhanced UI and new mobile photo editor features like rotate and crop.

The post Immich 1.111 Enhances Mobile Photo Editing appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Immich 1.111 Enhances Mobile Photo Editing

description:
Podman 5.2 container management tool brings VM creation on macOS with libkrun, supports GPUs, and expands Quadlet capabilities.

The post Podman 5.2 Enhances macOS VMs With GPU Support appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Podman 5.2 Enhances macOS VMs With GPU Support

description:
Manjaro Linux expands its offerings with a new immutable edition that is now open for community feedback and testing. Here’s more on that!

The post Manjaro Linux Unveils Immutable Variant appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Manjaro Linux Unveils Immutable Variant

description:
Since Linux kernel 6.9 is not an LTS (Long Term Support) branch, it was only supported for a couple of months and is now marked as EOL (End of Life) on the kernel.org website. Renowned Linux kernel developer Greg Kroah-Hartman has urged users to move to the latest Linux 6.10 kernel branch.

The post Linux Kernel 6.9 Reaches End of Life, Users Must Upgrade to Linux Kernel 6.10 appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Linux Kernel 6.9 Reaches End of Life, Users Must Upgrade to Linux Kernel 6.10
